string-array.name: attitude
string-array.item: If Your EGO Speaks With me Then my Attitude Replies you.
His story is history,My story is mystery.
Ignore me once and "I'll" show you who is the master of this game.
You "Haven't" even seen my bad side yet.
Congratulations you lost me.
I "Don't" hurt people with a lie,I kill them with Truth.
I "Don't" Need to explain myself because I know "I'M" Right.
Game bahut achha khela tune lekin Admin galt chun liya
"I'm" A Odd combination of Too Good and the Worst.
"It's" not my attitude "it's" the way i am.
If you "Don't" like me take a map,Get a car drive to hell.Have a Nice Trip.
Chill Babe, We are All Bad in someones story.
You glow differently when you are actually Happy.
In school "you're" given the lesson. Then the test.In life "you're" given the test,then the lesson.
My Attitude is reflection of my knowledge not my ego.
"Don't" play with me! because i know i can play better than you.
Down to earth,but still above you.
Life is short "don't" waste it on worry or assholes "you're" welcome.
If you think I "can't" live without you What are you? my phone charger.
Judge me when you are perfect.
You "Don't" like me..? Hate Me..! Problem Solved.
If you knew me yesterday u "don't know me anymore.I grow daily.
I "Don't" give anyone a reason to hate me.They create their own drama out of pure Jealousy.
Mere pass Kamino ki Fauj hai tabhi to zindagi me mauj hai.
If they need you temporarily ignore them permanently.
Let go of the shit That suffocates Your soul.
Some people Hate me bcoz a lot of people love me.
People Asked. Why ARE YOU STILL SINGLE? SHE REPLIED: I HAVE BRAIN.
be so positive that negative people "don't" want to be around you.
Main kisi ka bhi karza nahi rakhti hun ek sunti hun toh do suna deti hun.
Kill them with kindness and bury them with a smile.
SO CUTE WHEN PEOPLE WHO HATE ME FOR NO REASON, TRY TO KNOW EVERYTHING ABOUT ME.
BEHIND MY SMILE IS EVERYTHING "YOU'LL" NEVER UNDERSTAND.
behind every beautiful girl is the ugly relationship that made her afraid to love again.
You think you know me? think again.
Always speak how you feel and never be sorry for being real.
HELL IS EMPTY AND ALL THE DEVILS ARE HERE.
A QUEEN IS NOT BORN,SHE IS MADE.
Let them hate.Just Make sure they spell your name right.
WHEN YOUR HEART BREAKS,YOUR BRAIN START WORKING.
IAM NOT FOR EVERYONE.
JO SUDHAR JAAYE WOH HUM NHI,AUR HUME KOI SUDHAAR DE ITNA KISI MAI DAM NHI.
Those who fly solo have the strongest wings.
Live Life to Express, Not to Impress.

string-array.name: scenery
string-array.item: Just look at the beauty around you
Nature is not a place to visit it is home
"Let’s" find some beautiful place to get lost
Beautiful things "don’t" ask for attention
There are no shortcuts to any place worth going
The earth has music for those who listen
"There’s" no time to be bored in a world as beautiful as this..
Get lost in nature and you will find yourself
For a minute there, I lost myself
I have a therapist, her name is NATURE
There are far better things ahead than the ones we leave behind
To walk in nature is to witness a thousand miracles
Maa favorite color is sunset
Every sunset brings the promise of a new dawn
Every sunset is an opportunity to reset
Watch more Sunsets than Netflix
What a glorious greeting the sun gives the mountains
"It’s" not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves
You are not in the mountains. The mountains are in you.
Every mountain top is within reach if you just keep climbing
The best view comes after the hardest climb
I love places that make you realize how tiny you and your problems are
Life should have more mountains and less stress
Hike more. Worry Less.
Life is like a mountain, hard to climb, but worth the amazing view from the top
. Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all
Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better
Always take the scenic route
If you truly love nature, you will find beauty everywhere
Adopt the peace of nature her secret is patience
Capture the moment..It lives forever..
Nature never goes out of style
Colors are the smiles of nature
Nature is the art of God
Nature is not on the internet
Nature – cheaper than therapy
The silence of nature is very real. It surrounds you..you can feel it.
I believe in God, only I spell it NATURE
Nature itself is the best physician
Choose only one master – NATURE
My definition of beautiful – The Nature
Nature is not a place to visit. IT IS HOME.
Nature is one of your greatest teachers
Nature is painting for us, day after day, picture of infinite beauty
Every flower is a soul blossoming in nature
The Earth laughs in flowers
Spring is nature’s way of saying, ‘Let’s party!’
Autumn, the year’s last loveliest smile
Autumn is a second spring when every leaf is a flower
Snowflakes are kisses from heaven
Sunshine is the best medicine
Nothing is more beautiful than the loveliness of the woods before sunrise
Get lost in the forest and "Don’t" find a way back
The forest makes your heart gentle
And So..The Adventure BEGINS..!!
The greatest adventure is what lies ahead
"It’s" a big world out there..Explore
If sky is the limit, then go there
Going where the wind blows!
Fly high and touch the sky
"Let’s" sleep under the STARS
On the top of mountains and beneath the stars
I find my happiness where the sun shines
There is a pleasure in the pathless woods
"It’s" time for a new adventure
I love walks, hiking, exploring and being on the beach
Climb up on some hill at sunrise
The mountains are calling and I must go
Say yes to new adventures
The world is ours to explore
"Don’t" go through life, grow through life
"Don’t" Just Exist, Live
Wherever you are, be all there
No one rises suddenly in the world, not even the sun
Sunsets are "God’s" way of telling us that tomorrow will be beautiful
To watch a sunset is to connect with the divine
Cherish every sunset
Peace is seeing the sunrise or a sunset
I love waking up in the morning with sun in my face
Sunsets on the mountain are hard to beat
Sky above, earth below, and peace within
Life is better in hiking boots
Wild is my favorite color
It is in the still silence of nature where one will find true bliss
Some beautiful paths can’t be discovered without getting lost
I think that I shall never see a poem lovely as a tree
The poetry of earth is never dead
Nature speaks softly..you have to listen to it carefully
In all things of nature there is something of the marvelous
What a Wonderful World?
Keep close to nature’s heart
Take time to enjoy the natural Beauty that surrounds you
This place for sunrise is everything
With every rising of the sun, think of your life as just begun
Behind the clouds is the sun still shining
Happiness is sun, sand and a drink in my hand

string-array.name: beach
string-array.item: Life is better at the Beach!
Time spent at the BEACH is never wasted
I followed my heart and it led me to the BEACH
Life is a BEACH enjoy the WAVES
Let the countdown to the Beach begin!
"I’m" a true OCEANHOLIC!
I need Vitamin SEA
"I’m" happiest when floating in the sea
I am happy anywhere I can see the OCEAN
The smell of the ocean never gets old
Beach More Worry Less
"Don’t" worry BEACH happy
Nothing soothes the soul like a walk on the beach
BEACH: Heaven On Earth
The beach is calling, I must go..
Palm trees, ocean breeze, salty air, sun kissed hair, the endless summer take me there
I love the beach, and I love sunshine
Sunshine is my favorite accessory
Life takes you down many paths but my favorite one leads to the Beach
I can leave the sea but the sea never leaves me
I love being on the beach – "it’s" my favorite place
The waves of the sea help me get back to me
The ocean calms my restless soul
The best days are beach days
"Let’s" go to the beach
Hear the sound of the waves and relax
The voice of the sea speaks to the soul
A day at the beach restores the soul
The sea lives in every one of us
You are lucky enough to live by the sea
Find me under the Palms!
Find me where the waves are!
Sun, Sea, the Sand and ME
Happiness is..a day at BEACH
Happiness is..blue sea and white sand
Happiness comes in waves
Happiness is..good book and a beach
Happiness comes in salty water
All I need are palm trees and a cool breeze
B.E.A.C.H – Best Escape Anyone Can Have!
"There’s" no place like the Beach
A walk on the beach in priceless
High Tides Good Vibes
As free as the ocean
Let the sea set you free
Sink beneath the surface and you are free
Seek to Sea More!
The tans will fade, but the memories will last forever
All I want is to watch some waves roll in
All I need is a few days at the Beach
Everything is better at the BEACH
You can never have too much Beach
Sometimes you just have to go with the waves
Life is different at the Beach
Sky above our heads. Sand beneath our feet. Life is good.
Smell the sea, Feel the breeze, Hear the ocean, Be at ease
The BEACH: Free Therapy for the soul
Home is where the waves crash
HOME is where WAVES are
Every time I slip into the ocean, it’s like going home
I want to live by the Sea
A life without the beach is no life at all
"It’s" time for the sun, sea and sand
Brave and Free and Wild as the SEA
Get away from it all..find your peace on the beach
At the beach – time you enjoyed wasting, is not time wasted
The ocean is a poem without words
The Ocean soothes the soul
Surrounded by beauty, as far as sight goes
You can find me where the music meets the ocean
Meet me where the sky touches the sea
I want to run the beach’s length, because it never ends!
An early morning walk is a blessing for the whole day
"Don’t" worry, beach happy.
Beach hair, "don't" care.
Getting my daily dose of Vitamin Sea.
A good beach day keeps the doctor away.
"Life's" a beach.
Eat. Sleep. Beach. Repeat.
Less worries, more sunshine.
Sunshine is the best medicine.
I can sea clearly now.
"I followed my heart and it led me to the beach."
"Life takes you down many paths, but my favorite ones lead to the beach."
"Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air."
"If "there’s" heaven for me, "I’m" sure it has a beach attached to it."
"You’re not a wave, "you’re" a part of the ocean."
"To escape and sit quietly on the beach — "that’s" my idea of paradise."

string-array.name: coffee
string-array.item: Never Underestimate the Importance of Being Properly Caffeinated.
Good Coffee – Cheaper than Prozac!
Coffee is a way of stealing time which should by rights belong to your older self.
No one can understand the truth until he drinks of coffee’s frothy goodness.
To an old man a cup of coffee is like the door post of an old house — it sustains and strengthens him.
People say money can’t buy happiness. They Lie. Money buys Coffee, Coffee makes Me Happy!
Decaffeinated coffee is like a hairless cat, it exists, but that doesn’t make it right.
Coffee makes us severe, and grave, and philosophical.
I orchestrate my mornings to the tune of coffee.
Conscience keeps more people awake than coffee.
Should I kill myself, or have a cup of coffee?
My coffee machine is the most beautiful person in the world to me.
Sometimes I stay up so late that I have my morning coffee before I go to bed.
Good communication is as stimulating as black coffee, and just as hard to sleep after.
Drinking beer in a coffee mug. I feel like I am cheating on my coffee.
We are cups, constantly and quietly being filled. Trick is knowing how to tip ourselves over and let the beautiful stuff out.
Coffee is the best thing to douse the sunrise with.
Everyone should believe in something. I believe I will have another coffee.
Coffee should be black as Hell, strong as death, and sweet as love.
I "don’t" know what "I’d" do without coffee. "I’m" guessing 25 to life.
Science may never come up with a better office communication system than the coffee break.
A 41-inch bust and a lot of perseverance will get you more than a cup of coffee – a lot more.
Good communication is just as stimulating as black coffee, and just as hard to sleep after.
7 days without coffee makes one WEAK.
Caffeine — It maintains my sunny personality.
The powers of a "man’s" mind are directly proportional to the quantity of coffee he drank.
"I’m" going to start measuring the complexity of coding tasks in coffee cups. “This was a five-espresso algorithm.”
A mathematician is a device for turning coffee into theorems.
Coffee smells like freshly ground heaven.
Decaf? No, "it’s" dangerous to dilute my caffeine stream.
Doctors found traces of blood in my coffee stream.
Did I run out of caffeine or are you really that boring?
If it "wasn’t" for coffee, "I’d" have no discernible personality at all.
Compared to Clinton, I feel like a loser. I "can’t" even get the intern to make me coffee!
Coffee which makes the politician wise, and see through all things with his half-shut eyes.
I like my coffee with cream and my literature with optimism.
I like my coffee strong and my women weak.
Coffee. Creative lighter fluid.
A morning without coffee is like sleep.
Every morning I long to hold you…I need you, I want you, I have to have you…your warmth, your smell, your taste…ohhh coffee, I love you.
Drink coffee! Do Stupid Things Faster with More Energy.
Coffee! Is the planet shaking or is just me?
How far behind would technology be, if no one ever discovered coffee?
"I’m" a romantic. I like cold Coffee and orgasms that arrive fifteen minutes after "I’ve" put on my clothes and paid the lady.
Even bad coffee is better… than no Coffee at all.
Adventure in life is good… consistency in Coffee even better.
I like instant gratification. "It’s" like instant Coffee, only it "won’t" keep you up all night.
What do you want?… Just Coffee. Black – like my soul.
I would rather suffer with coffee than be senseless.
I never drink coffee at lunch. I find it keeps me awake for the afternoon.
Television is not real life. In real life people actually have to leave the coffee shop and go to jobs.
Like everyone else who makes the mistake of getting older, I begin each day with coffee and obituaries.
If this is coffee, please bring me some tea; but if this is tea, please bring me some coffee.
A cup of gourmet coffee shared with a friend is happiness tasted and time well spent.
Adventure in life is good. Consistency in coffee even better.
A morning without coffee is like sleep.
"Life’s" too short to drink cheap coffee.
Everybody should believe in something. I believe "I’ll" have another coffee.
The road to success is paved in coffee.
This coffee tastes like mud! Well, it was ground this morning.
I think if I were a woman "I’d" wear coffee as a perfume.
There is no live without water. Because water is needed to make coffee.
To drink is human. To drink coffee is divine.
Given enough coffee I could rule the world.
A cup of coffee shared with a friend is happiness tasted and time well spent.
I "don’t" have a problem with caffeine. I have a problem without it.
Drink Coffee. Do stupid things even faster with more energy.
Caffeine-The other Vitamin C.
I have measured out my life with coffee spoons.
Black as the devil, hot as hell, pure as an angel, sweet as love.
Caffeine "isn’t" a drug, "it’s" a vitamin.
Coffee is a beverage that puts one to sleep when not drank.
Sleep is a symptom of caffeine deprivation.
Decaffeinated coffee is kind of like kissing your sister.
"There’s" nothing sweeter than a cup of bitter coffee.

string-array.name: travel
string-array.item: “THE WORLD IS A BOOK AND THOSE WHO DO NOT TRAVEL READ ONLY A PAGE.”
“NOT ALL THOSE WHO WANDER ARE LOST”
“LIFE IS EITHER A DARING ADVENTURE OR NOTHING AT ALL”
“TAKE ONLY MEMORIES, LEAVE ONLY FOOTPRINTS”
“TRAVEL IS FATAL TO PREJUDICE, BIGOTRY, AND NARROW MINDEDNESS, AND MANY OF OUR PEOPLE NEED IT SORELY ON THESE ACCOUNTS.”
” THE REAL VOYAGE OF DISCOVERY CONSISTS NOT IN SEEKING NEW LANDSCAPES, BUT IN HAVING NEW EYES.”
“TRAVEL MAKES ONE MODEST, YOU SEE WHAT A TINY PLACE YOU OCCUPY IN THE WORLD.”
NEVER GO ON TRIPS WITH ANYONE YOU DO NOT LOVE.”
“TRAVELING IT LEAVES YOU SPEECHLESS, THEN TURNS YOU INTO A STORYTELLER.”
“IF YOU THINK ADVENTURE IS DANGEROUS, TRY ROUTINE, "IT'S" LETHAL”
“GREAT THINGS NEVER CAME FROM COMFORT ZONES.”
“IF YOU ARE ALWAYS TRYING TO BE NORMAL, YOU WILL NEVER KNOW HOW AMAZING YOU CAN BE.”
“STOP WORRYING ABOUT THE POTHOLES IN THE ROAD AND ENJOY THE JOURNEY”
“FEAR IS ONLY TEMPORARY. REGRETS LAST FOREVER.”
“LIFE BEGINS AT THE END OF YOUR COMFORT ZONE.”
“TRAVEL "DOESN'T" BECOME ADVENTURE UNTIL YOU LEAVE YOURSELF BEHIND”
“CLIMB THE MOUNTAIN SO YOU CAN SEE THE WORLD, NOT SO THE WORLD CAN SEE YOU.
“JOBS FILL YOUR POCKET BUT ADVENTURES FILL YOUR SOUL.”
“"DON'T" WORRY ABOUT THE WORLD ENDING TODAY, "IT’S" ALREADY TOMORROW IN AUSTRALIA.”
DRINK HEAVILY WITH LOCALS WHENEVER POSSIBLE
I TOLD THE DOCTOR I BROKE MY LEG IN TWO PLACES. HE TOLD ME TO QUIT GOING TO THOSE PLACES
THERE IS NOTHING SAFER THAN FLYING, "IT’S" CRASHING THAT IS DANGEROUS
I ALWAYS LIKE TO GO TO WASHINGTON D.C. IT GIVES ME A CHANCE TO VISIT MY MONEY.
JET LAG IS FOR AMATEURS
“TRAVEL IS GLAMOROUS ONLY IN RETROSPECT.”
I WISH I HAD NEVER GONE TRAVELING. SAID NO ONE EVER.
“MAN CANNOT DISCOVER NEW OCEANS UNLESS HE HAS THE COURAGE TO LOSE SIGHT OF THE SHORE.”
“ "IT'S" BETTER TO TRAVEL WELL THAN TO ARRIVE”
“TRAVEL IS THE ONLY THING YOU BUY THAT MAKES YOU RICHER.”
“IT IS BETTER TO SEE SOMETHING ONCE THAN TO HEAR ABOUT IT A THOUSAND TIMES.”
“THE REAL VOYAGE OF DISCOVERY CONSISTS NOT IN SEEKING NEW LANDSCAPES, BUT HAVING NEW EYES.”
“WHEN WAS THE LAST TIME YOU DID SOMETHING FOR THE FIRST TIME?”
“SOMEDAY "I'M" GOING TO BE FREE AND "I'M" GOING TO TRAVEL THE WORLD”
“LIVE WITH NO EXCUSES AND TRAVEL WITH NO REGRETS”
“WE TRAVEL NOT TO ESCAPE LIFE BUT FOR LIFE NOT TO ESCAPE US.”
“PEOPLE "DON'T" TAKE TRIPS, TRIPS TAKE PEOPLE.”
“ "DON'T" LISTEN TO WHAT THEY SAY, GO SEE”
"DON'T" QUIT YOUR DAY DREAM
“I "DON'T" KNOW WHERE "I'M" GOING, BUT "I'M" ON MY WAY”
OH, THE PLACES "YOU'LL" GO.
“TRY TO BE A RAINBOW IN SOMEONE "ELSE'S" CLOUD”
"LIFE'S" A JOURNEY, NOT A DESTINATION
“WHERE TO NEXT?”
“TO TRAVEL IS TO LIVE”
“I WANT TO MAKE MEMORIES ALL OVER THE WORLD”
“TO TRAVEL IS TO DISCOVER THAT EVERYONE IS WRONG ABOUT OTHER COUNTRIES.”
“YOU MUST BE THE CHANGE YOU WISH TO SEE IN THE WORLD.”
“TO TRAVEL IS TO DISCOVER THAT EVERYONE IS WRONG ABOUT OTHER COUNTRIES.”
“YOU MUST BE THE CHANGE YOU WISH TO SEE IN THE WORLD.”
“WITHOUT NEW EXPERIENCES, SOMETHING INSIDE US SLEEPS. THE SLEEPER MUST AWAKEN.”
“THOSE WHO FOLLOW THE CROWD USUALLY GET LOST IN IT.”
“DOING WHAT YOU LIKE IS FREEDOM, LIKING WHAT YOU DO IS HAPPINESS.”
“BECAUSE WHEN YOU STOP AND LOOK AROUND, THIS LIFE IS PRETTY AMAZING.”
“THIS HEART OF MINE WAS MADE TO TRAVEL THIS WORLD”
“THE IMPULSE TO TRAVEL IS ONE OF THE HOPEFUL SYMPTOMS OF LIFE”
“ "LET'S" FIND SOME BEAUTIFUL PLACE TO GET LOST”
“ "I'M" IN LOVE WITH CITIES "I'VE" NEVER BEEN TO AND PEOPLE "I'VE" NEVER MET.”
“ TRAVEL…THE BEST WAY TO BE LOST AND FOUND AT THE SAME TIME.”
“THE JOURNEY IS MY HOME.”
“ "IT'S" A BIG WORLD OUT THERE, IT WOULD BE A SHAME NOT TO EXPERIENCE IT.”
“ LIFE "ISN'T" ABOUT FINDING YOURSELF , LIFE IS ABOUT CREATING YOURSELF.”
“IF YOUR SHIP "DOESN'T" COME IN, SWIM OUT TO IT.”
“YOU CAN SHAKE THE SAND FROM YOUR SHOES, BUT NOT FROM YOUR SOUL.”
“WE WANDER FOR DISTRACTION, BUT WE TRAVEL FOR FULFILLMENT.”
“IT "DOESN'T" MATTER WHERE "YOU'RE" GOING, "IT'S" WHO YOU HAVE BESIDE YOU.
“TRAVELING IS NOT SOMETHING "YOU'RE" GOOD AT. "IT'S" SOMETHING YOU DO, LIKE BREATHING.”
“ALL WE HAVE TO DECIDE IS WHAT TO DO WITH THE TIME THAT IS GIVEN US.”
“IT FEELS GOOD TO BE LOST IN THE RIGHT DIRECTION.”
“TRAVELING ALLOWS YOU TO BECOME SO MANY DIFFERENT VERSIONS OF YOURSELF.”
“TRAVEL HAS A WAY OF STRETCHING THE MIND.”
“ALL JOURNEYS HAVE SECRET DESTINATIONS OF WHICH THE TRAVELER IS UNAWARE.”
“A JOURNEY IS BEST MEASURED IN FRIENDS RATHER THAN MILES.”
“JUST GO. GO SEE ALL THE BEAUTY IN THE WORLD”
“I TRAVEL NOT TO GO ANYWHERE BUT TO GO. I TRAVEL FOR "TRAVEL'S" SAKE.”
PARIS IS ALWAYS A GOOD IDEA
“YOU ONLY LIVE ONCE, BUT IF YOU DO IT RIGHT, ONCE IS ENOUGH.”
“ONCE A YEAR, GO SOMEPLACE "YOU'VE" NEVER BEEN BEFORE.”
“THERE IS NO MOMENT OF DELIGHT IN ANY PILGRIMAGE LIKE THE BEGINNING OF IT”
“TRY TO BE A RAINBOW IN SOMEONE "ELSE'S" CLOUD”

string-array.name: friendship
string-array.item: “Sometimes being with your best friend is all the therapy you need.”
“Friends are the siblings God never gave us.”
“True friends are like diamonds — bright, beautiful, valuable, and always in style.”
“There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship.”
“Friends are the family you choose.“
“ "Don’t" make friends who are comfortable to be with. Make friends who will force you to lever yourself up.”
“The most beautiful discovery true friends make is that they can grow separately without growing apart.”
“Life is partly what we make it, and partly what it is made by the friends we choose.”
“They may forget what you said, but they will never forget how you made them feel.”
“Find a group of people who challenge and inspire you; spend a lot of time with them, and it will change your life.”
“The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched — they must be felt with the heart.”
“Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.”
“A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.”
“A friend is someone who understands your past, believes in your future, and accepts you just the way you are.”
“Growing apart "doesn’t" change the fact that for a long time we grew side by side; our roots will always be tangled. "I’m" glad for that.”
“Let us be grateful to the people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.”
“" It’s" not what we have in life, but who we have in our life that matters.”
“To the world you may be just one person, but to one person you may be the world.”
“A friend is one who overlooks your broken fence and admires the flowers in your garden.”
“A friend who understands your tears is much more valuable than a lot of friends who only know your smile.”
“A friend is one of the best things you can be and the greatest things you can have.”
“Best friends are the people in your life who make you laugh louder, smile brighter and live better.”
“Time "doesn’t" take away from friendship, nor does separation.”
“When the world is so complicated, the simple gift of friendship is within all of our hands.”
“ "There’s" not a word yet for old friends "who’ve" just met.”
A single rose can be my garden…a single friend, my world.”
“Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.”
“Friends are those rare people who ask how we are and then wait to hear the answer.”
“A friend knows the song in my heart and sings it to me when my memory fails.”
“ "It’s" the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter.”
“Truly great friends are hard to find, difficult to leave, and impossible to forget.”
“A good friend is like a four-leaf clover; hard to find and lucky to have.”
“I would rather walk with a friend in the dark, than alone in the light.”
“True friends are never apart, maybe in distance but never in heart.”
“No friendship is an accident.”
“Anything is possible when you have the right people there to support you.”
“A sweet friendship refreshes the soul.”
“Life was meant for good friends and great adventures.”
“True friends are always together in spirit.”
“You "don’t" have to be crazy to be my friend. "I’ll" train you.”
“There is nothing better than a friend, unless it is a friend with chocolate.“
“‘Tis the privilege of friendship to talk nonsense, and to have her nonsense respected.”
“A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.”
“A best friend is someone who makes you laugh even when you think "you’ll" never smile again.”
“Best friends. Because if anyone else heard our conversations "we’d" end up in the mental hospital.”
“Best friends don’t care if your house is clean. They care if you have wine.”
“If you are ever lucky enough to find a weirdo, never let them go.”
“I think "we’ll" be friends forever because "we’re" too lazy to find new friends.”
“Friends buy you food. Best friends eat your food.”
“God made us best friends because he knew our moms "couldn’t" handle us as sisters.”
“ "We’ll" be the old ladies causing trouble in the nursing home.”
“ "We’ll" be best friends forever because you already know too much.”
“True friendship is when you walk into their house and your WiFi connects automatically.”
“Never let your best friends get lonely…keep disturbing them.”
“I love that our effortless friendship fits perfectly with my laziness.”
“The essence of true friendship is to make allowance for "another’s" little lapses.”
“A friend can tell you things you "don’t" want to tell yourself.”
“Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity.”
“Friends…they cherish one "another’s" hopes. They are kind to one "another’s" dreams.”
“The only way to have a friend is to be one.”
“My best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake.”
“Ultimately the bond of all companionship, whether in marriage or in friendship, is conversation.”
“Real friendship, like real poetry, is extremely rare — and precious as a pearl.”
“My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.”
“If you live to be 100, I hope I live to be 100 minus 1 day, so I never have to live without you.”
“Love is friendship set on fire.”
“The love that comes from friendship is the underlying facet of a happy life.”
“Friendship is accepting a person with all their qualities — good and bad.”
“ "It’s" not being in love that makes me happy. It is the person that I am in love with that does.”

string-array.name: birthday
string-array.item: Birthdays are "nature’s" way of telling us to eat more cake!
On your birthday "I’m" going to share the secret to staying young: lie about your age.
“You deserve everything happy. Wishing you that all year long!”
On your birthday I wish you success and endless happiness!.Wishing you an awesome birthday!
Happy birthday to my closest and oldest friend! I feel blessed, because our friendship is a true gift of life.
May your birthday and your life be as wonderful as you are . Happy Birthday
Wish you a beautiful birthday and I hope you get double of everything you want in your life. Happy Birthday!
May your sweet smile never fade away. I wish you a very happy and sweet birthday. Good bless you.
My dear friend, may your special day be full of beautiful, magical and unforgettable moments!
You are my special friend,I love you from the core of my heart,"I'll" keep you near always.Happy Birthday Dear Friend.
Thinking of you and the good times we spent make me smile! Happy birthday to a friend who is always close to my heart.
Happy Birthday Dear Sister You Are Amazing You Are Special You Are Unique You Are Kind You Are Precious You Are Loved.
My crazy, loving, caring and fun little sister, life without you would have been a crazy twister. Happy birthday
Happy Birthday you are a beautiful person, inside and out .I hope that you remember that,today and always.
Wish a fabulous birthday to my cutest baby
Maybe I am not telling it so often, but I value our friendship.Friends like you make life special!
Wishing you an awesome day,With good luck on your way, Stay blessed and happy this day, My dear friend on your birthday today
